channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15635] Mean age of Blocks in cache (seconds) on webUI should be greater than zero
item.summary: Mean age of Blocks in cache (seconds) on webUI should be greater than zero

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Yep. Thats bad Heng Chen

check the code today, and found that the mean is calculated by total/count
total is updated when one age added. 


      private final long now = System.nanoTime();

     ......

      long age = this.now - cb.getCachedTime();

      this.hist.add(age, 1);

I think the total may exceeds the Long.MAX_VALUE.

Due to the unit for this metics is seconds, maybe we could change age from nanoSeconds to Seconds.

-1 overall
